mapper.select: select inf245g2.EMPLEADO.Flag from inf245g2.EMPLEADO where inf245g2.EMPLEADO.IdEmpleado = #{codigoEmpleado}

SELECT inf245g2.JORNADA.IdJornada AS idJornada, inf245g2.JORNADA.IdEmpleado AS idEmpleado,
inf245g2.PERSONA.Nombres as nombreEmpleado, inf245g2.PERSONA.ApePaterno as apaterno,
inf245g2.JORNADA.HoraEntrada AS horaEntrada, inf245g2.JORNADA.HoraSalida AS horaSalida, inf245g2.JORNADA.Fecha AS fecha, inf245g2.JORNADA.HoraMarcado AS horaMarca, inf245g2.JORNADA.Flag AS flag
FROM inf245g2.JORNADA , inf245g2.EMPLEADO , inf245g2.PERSONA
WHERE
inf245g2.EMPLEADO.IdEmpleado = inf245g2.PERSONA.IdPersona AND inf245g2.EMPLEADO.IdEmpleado = inf245g2.JORNADA.IdEmpleado
ORDER BY 1 DESC ;
mapper.update: update inf245g2.EMPLEADO set inf245g2.EMPLEADO.Flag = IF( inf245g2.EMPLEADO.Flag >0,0,1) where inf245g2.EMPLEADO.IdEmpleado = #{codigo}
